subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Ticket sales start Friday for the 2010 Vancouver Olympics and will be available for five weeks through an online process designed to thwart scalpers. The organizing committee will accept applications for tickets between Friday and Nov. 7, submitted either online at vancouver2010.com or through a paper application available by phone. Who gets which tickets will be decided after the deadline for applications. Applicants for tickets will be notified in late November or early December if they are successful. tickets.
